GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
drm/mediatek: Modify dpi power on/off sequence.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit 698bbaf0b4ed93321c205a026fc8262b8b3264d5, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit 6bd4763fd532cff43f9b15704f324c45a9806f53. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/mediatek: Modify dpi power on/off sequence.
